articles.description: PLANS for 127 new homes on the site of a former steel factory have been submitted.
articles.content:
PLANS for 127 new homes on the site of a former steel factory have been submitted.
The proposal seeks planning permission to redevelop the vacant former site of Corus Trailers on Whessoe Road, Darli… [+2687 chars]

articles.author: Adriana Elgueta
articles.title: Robin Fransman dead at 53 – Vaccine sceptic and anti-lockdown economist dies of Covid weeks after refusing... - The Sun
articles.content:
A DUTCH economist, who downplayed the impact of Covid and refused to get jabbed, has died of the virus yesterday age 53.
Well-known Covid policy and vaccine sceptic, Robin Fransman, revealed almost … [+3454 chars]
